Description: Calcium borates are obtained from surface mining of colemanite (Ca2B6O11 * 5H2O) deposits. Open pit mining requires extensive drilling and blasting to reach load deposits. Ores are removed from the mine and transported to milling and beneficiating plants for concentrating the ore.
